net.unicon.cas.addons.serviceregistry

Class JsonServiceRegistryDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.unicon.cas.addons.serviceregistry.JsonServiceRegistryDao
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener, org.jasig.cas.services.ServiceRegistryDao, org.springframework.context.ApplicationListener<ResourceChangeDetectingEventNotifier.ResourceChangedEvent>

    public final class JsonServiceRegistryDao
extends Object
implements org.jasig.cas.services.ServiceRegistryDao, org.springframework.context.ApplicationListener<ResourceChangeDetectingEventNotifier.ResourceChangedEvent>
    Implementation of ServiceRegistryDao that reads services definition from JSON configuration file at the Spring Application Context initialization time. After un-marshaling services from JSON blob, delegates the storage and retrieval to InMemoryServiceRegistryDaoImpl

    This class implements ${link ApplicationListener} to reload services definitions in real-time. This class is thread safe.

    Since:
    0.8
    Author:
    Dmitriy Kopylenko, Unicon, inc.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  JsonServiceRegistryDao.ServicesManagerInjectableBeanPostProcessor
      Spring infrastructure class to support circular references DI of ReloadableServicesManager and JsonServiceRegistryDao required to make real-time reloading behavior work with disabling the default CAS periodic polling reloading behavior which avoids unnecessary additional reloading.
